sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'

import {Card, Form, Button, Col} from 'react-bootstrap';

export default class Exercise extends Component {

    
    constructor(props){
        super(props);
        this.state={
            name:'',
            duration:'',
            position:'',
            coach:''
        };
    }

    submitExercise(event){
        alert(this.state.name);
        event.preventDefault();
    }

    render(){

        return(
            <Card className={"border border-dark bg-dark text-white"}>
                <Card.Header>
                    Add Exercise
                </Card.Header>
                <Form onSubmit={this.submitExercise} id="exerciseFormId"> 
                    <Card.Body>
                        <Form.Row>
                            <Form.Group as={Col}>
                                <Form.Label>Exercise Name</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="text" name="name" className={"bg-dark text-white"} placeholder="Exercise Name" />
                                <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                Enter the exercise name.
                                </Form.Text>
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group as={Col}>
                                <Form.Label>Exercise Duration</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="text" name="duration" className={"bg-dark text-white"} placeholder="Exercise Duration" />
                                <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                Enter the exercise duration.
                                </Form.Text>
                            </Form.Group>
                        </Form.Row>
                        <Form.Row>
                            <Form.Group as={Col}>
                                <Form.Label>Player Position</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="text" name="position" className={"bg-dark text-white"} placeholder="Player Position" />
                                <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                Enter the player position for this exercise.
                                </Form.Text>
                            </Form.Group>
                            <Form.Group as={Col}>
                                <Form.Label>Coach Name</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control type="text" name="coach" className={"bg-dark text-white"} placeholder="Coach Name" />
                                <Form.Text className="text-muted">
                                Enter the name of the coach who will lead the exercise.
                                </Form.Text>
                            </Form.Group>
                        </Form.Row>
                    </Card.Body>
                    <Card.Footer style={{"textAlign":"right"}}>
                    <Button variant="success" type="submit">
                            Submit
                        </Button>
                    </Card.Footer>
                </Form>
            </Card>
        );
    }
}
